name: SkeleRun (jertlemiah)
description:
I uploaded the wrong file last minute, so there's nothing to play :/

Here's a short video of what we had at the time of submission: 

It's pretty cool to the pathfinding and trajectories as well:

SkeleRun was planned to be a level based pseudo-roguelike where you play as a skeleton that is being chased by dogs, and the only way to get past them is to throw your own bones.

The submitted file has the test field, but no achievable objectives, so there's no way to win!
